input.sentences: we took a trip today and saw many things including this poster for protests .
we saw a wall with written scripts on it .
many people were out and about on the streets .
there was even a lion dancing parade .
output.sentences: People will go on a trip to go to protests and bring a protest.
Sometimes, in the city, they'll see a wall that has been written on with scripts.
There are statues that they can see in the park.
The streets are always filled with people, especially in China Town.
During a special holiday, they'll have a parade featuring a dancing lion.
